description: After Scottish engineer John Loudon McAdam who pioneered this method of road construction around 1820.

verbs.description: macadamize (third-person singular simple present macadamizes, present participle macadamizing, simple past and past participle macadamized)

entries.meaning: To cover, as a road, or street, with small, broken stones, so as to form a smooth, hard, convex surface.
